endpoints.description: Retrieve recent leak detection data based on sensor analytics.
Trigger analysis of collected sensor data to detect potential leaks.
Fetch detailed information about a specific leak detection event based on its identifier.
Obtain a list of monitored water distribution points in the network.
Update or modify monitoring parameters for a specific water distribution point.
Access raw data collected by all active sensors in the network within a defined period.
Remove monitoring for a specific water distribution point from the network.
Retrieve analytical reports summarizing water distribution and leak detection efficiency.
Adjust the configuration settings of a particular sensor to optimize data collection.
Send out repair crew notifications based on confirmed leak detections and severity assessments.
